scripts.build: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/backend && npm run dev" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: cd apps/backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: cd apps/backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
